com.github.sanity4j.workflow

Class ClassFileCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sanity4j.workflow.AbstractFileCollector
      • com.github.sanity4j.workflow.ClassFileCollector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkUnit, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClassFileCollector
extends AbstractFileCollector
    ClassFileCollector collects class files from multiple directory hierarchies and places them in a single directory hierarchy. This is necessary, as some tools don't allow multiple class directories to be specified.
    Since:
    Sanity4J 1.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

      • isMandatory

        protected boolean isMandatory()
        Description copied from class: AbstractFileCollector
